full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/21/2023 EMPLOYMENT CONTRACT 8 March 67 On this day of 19 / this Contract for employment Mr. and Mrs. Erle P. Halliburton is made by and between : herein called "Employer", and Betty Mao / herein called "Domestic Help". The parties hereto agree as follows: 1. TERM: Commencing upon Domestic Help's arrival at the residence of the Employer, the Employer hereby employs the Domestic Help, and the Domestic Help hereby agrees to serve the Employer as a domestic for a period of twenty-four (24) months. 2. PERFORMANCE AND DUTIES: Domestic Help agrees to devote her/his full time and effort in carrying forward the duties as assigned by the Employer, and at all times, on and off duty, to conduct herself/himself in a proper manner, and Employer agrees to treat Domestic Help fairly and properly. 3. SALARY: The Employer agrees to pay the Domestic Help, in addition to full board and lodging, a $200 for 6 months, $225 for 6 months, $250 thereafter salary of per month. Further, after completion of 12 months employment hereunder, the Domestic Help will receive one week's fully paid vacation at a time to be designated by the Employer, or if the Domestic Help so elects, in lieu of said vacation, an additional week's salary. 4. TERMINATION OF CONTRACT: This Contract is terminable only upon justification, and if a dispute arises respecting the justification, then said justification shall be determined by the Labor Commissioner of California the State of 5. LABOR LAWS: The Employer agrees to comply with Federal and State laws regulating the type of labor to be performed hereunder and to make the proper deductions from the gross pay of the Domestic Help as provided for under Federal and State law. 6. SICKNESS: In the event the Domestic Help becomes ill, the Employer shall provide food, accomodations and salary for not more than fifteen (15) days during each year of this Contract, but Employer shall have no responsibility for costs of medical attention for the Domestic Help. EMPLOYER: Mrs. Hellificition 3 4507 Perham Road, Corona Del Mar, California . . NEW Address: March 8, 1967 LOS ANGELES Subscribed and sworn to before me on California Orange STATE OF County of OFFICIAL SEAL Ruin Achieven , RUTH SCHUH NOTARY UBLIC-CALIFORNIA (SEAL) Notary Public in and for said ORANGE COUNTY County and State .ty Commission Expires October 25, 1968 DOMESTIC HELP: Signed: Betty Mao Dated: July 28, 1967 Address: No. S. Lane 95, Shui Yuan Street, Taipei, Taiwan, Rep of China
